Binary: puredata, puredata-core, puredata-gui, puredata-gui-l10n, puredata-doc, puredata-dev, puredata-utils, puredata-extra
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), python3, help2man, gettext, libasound2-dev [linux-any], portaudio19-dev, libjack-dev
Package-List: puredata deb sound optional arch=all puredata-core deb sound optional arch=any puredata-dev deb libdevel optional arch=all puredata-doc deb doc optional arch=all puredata-extra deb sound optional arch=any puredata-gui deb sound optional arch=all puredata-gui-l10n deb localization optional arch=all puredata-utils deb utils optional arch=any
